stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    %% Compact, readable bus-reset state machine: R0 left, R1 center, T0 right

    powerReset: powerReset
    resetDetected: resetDetected
    ibrCond: ibr && !(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    maxArbStateTimeout: maxArbStateTimeout(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

    R0: R0 — Reset Start\nresetStartActions(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    R1: R1 — Reset Wait\nresetWaitActions(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    T0: T0 — Tree ID Start

    %% Triggers to R0 (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    powerReset --> R0: arbPowerReset(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    resetDetected --> R0: initiatedReset = FALSE
    ibrCond --> R0: initiatedReset = TRUE / resetDuration = RESET_TIME
    maxArbStateTimeout --> R0: initiatedReset = TRUE / resetDuration = RESET_TIME; PH_EVENT_INDICATION

    %% Core transitions
    R0 --> R1: arbTimer >= resetDuration / resetStartActions(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    R1 --> T0: resetComplete(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) / arbTimer = 0

    %% Back-transition and timeout
    R1 --> R0: arbTimer >= resetDuration + RESET_WAIT / resetDuration = RESET_TIME

    note left of R0
      External triggers to R0:\n• powerReset (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker))\n• resetDetected (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)\n• ibr && !(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)\n• maxArbStateTimeout(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)\n• from TX: Transmit → -TX:R0
    end note

    note right of R1
      Timeout/Recovery:\n• R1→R0 sets resetDuration = RESET_TIME\n• R1→T0 on resetComplete(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) sets arbTimer = 0
    end note
